full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Name / Title**
------------------------

W0125-24WR02 - Paint and Vehicle Body Repair

**Reference Number**
--------------------

WS3994252565 - Doc 4007387105

**Solicitation Type**
---------------------

Request for Standing Offer (RSO)

**Publication Details**
------------------------

* Publication Date: May 15, 2023
* Tender Closing Date and Time: June 5, 2023 at 2pm (EDT)
* Amendment Date: May 15, 2023

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Standing Offer for Paint and Vehicle Body Repair Services. The required services include:

* Bodywork repair and painting of light and heavy commercial vehicles, Standard Military Pattern (SMP) vehicles, boats, and heavy off-road equipment
* Supply of labour, parts, and materials for the above services

**Services Specification**
-------------------------

* The successful bidder must provide services on an “as-and-when-requested” basis during the period of the Standing Offer.
* The Standing Offer is for a 3-year period from August 1, 2023 to July 31, 2026.

**Technical Specifications**
---------------------------

* The contractor must meet the requirements outlined in the tender document and any additional specifications that may be included.

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

Competitive - Open Bidding

**Bid Evaluation Criteria**
---------------------------

The bids will be evaluated based on lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.
